name: Wild Foraging – Bc Rainforest Walking Tour
description:
It’s spring! So what are you going to do now?  Forage for wild edibles!  Great for kids, food nerds and hikers.
Everything you need to know to safely gather, prepare and cook
the unique flavours found only in nature.  Our ever-popular Wild Edible Identification Trips are 2-hour trips that include a walk through BC’s forest to identify whatever we find; fiddleheads, licorice fern, big leaf maple flowers, nettles, oyster mushrooms, then a chef-prepared wild light lunch with tips and tricks on how best to cook all the dozens of different wild mushrooms in the forests.  (note: this is not a live cooking demo)
